posts.post_title: T210 Glawe Series 3 No Creases Tough Card
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bob
I won 2 T210 Glawes this week so one must go. This is a nice card won in the Brockelman-Luckey auction described as creaseless. Rather tough card, I had waited a long time for this card and then won 2! Go figure. I paid $84.38 for it plus shipping but will let it go for $70 and I'll pick up the shipping. Paypal is fine. trophybob@sbcglobal.net
Thanks,
Bob
